name: Deep Despair Remastered
description:
Deep Despair Remastered is an improved version of the original game with significant graphic, visual and sound enhancements. Survival, building, craft, dangerous dungeons, battles and everything that you did in the original game now feels completely new! Thanks to a radical overhaul of the game, the survival experience will become much brighter and more atmospheric! Welcome again: Deep Despair is back in a new guise, your adventure is just beginning ...

Features:
  • Great graphics
  • Complete freedom of action
  • Over 100 units of content
  • Big worlds to explore
  • Advanced hunger system
  • Crafting
  • Building and Gathering
  • Growing crops
  • Hunting and survival
